page.title: 02Industry in S.Clevedon&Kenn
page.content: THe only large manufacturing industry is{TRW(Cam Gears)}which gives employment to 723 local people. The company produces power assisted steering gear for BRITISH LEYLAND, FORD,SAAB,and VOLVO cars in the { {Clevedon }factory but in other branches of TRW they make parts towards the space programme of the U.S.A. and Military and Agricultural vehicles. In one week the{Clevedon}works produce 9000 parts which sell for Â£55 each. {TRW(Cam Gears)}have a social club in{ {Kenn}which organises sports matches, firework displays and social evenings for their employees. Cam Gears also take part in all local events e.g. the {Carnival.
